## Discussion

Setting [doc://com.apple.corenfc/documentation/CoreNFC/NFCISO7816APDU/expectedResponseLength] with a value less than 0 means the Le field is absent.

# expectedResponseLength

**Instance Property**

The expected response data length (Le) in bytes.

## Declaration

```swift
var expectedResponseLength: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

Setting [doc://com.apple.corenfc/documentation/CoreNFC/NFCISO7816APDU/expectedResponseLength] with a value less than 0 means the Le field is absent.
title: expectedResponseLength
